root.name: Sudden Strike
root.description: Overview:The first in a series of World War 2 RTS games that allows you to control the Soviet, Allied, and German forces through three individual campaigns mirroring the events of World War 2. The game allowed the user to control individual forces as they occupied vehicles for combat, buildings for cover, and artillery cannons for assaults. The player can take over and utilize enemy buildings and weaponry as well as call in air strikes and recon. Line of sight, troop/weapon placement, and cover are all crucial to surviving and assaulting the enemy.
